tool_description: Generate lottery numbers for over 300+ lottery games around the world. Super easy REST based API.
name: Lottery Number Generation
title: Lottery Number Generation

api_list.name: /lottery/supported
api_list.description: Get the list of supported lottery games supported in the given country.

api_list.name: /lottery/countries
api_list.description: Get the complete list of countries supported in the number generation API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lottery-number-generation.p.rapidapi.com/lottery/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lottery-number-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lottery-number-generation.p.rapidapi.com/lottery/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lottery-number-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /lottery/draw
api_list.description: Generate random draw for a given lottery game.
